tool_description: Brainstorm physical signals and behaviors  to express your characterâ€™s emotions in ways that fit their personality and emotional range. Essential tool for creative writing.
title: Emotion TheSaurus

api_list.name: Get physical signals and behaviors
api_list.description: Get physical signals and behaviors from a specific emotion.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://emotion-thesaurus.p.rapidapi.com/api/{emotion}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "emotion-thesaurus.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
